00004 {
00005 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE

00013             << " is going to be destroyed." << std::endl;

00021 /*! complete the upper-right components */
00022 inline void _dsymatrix::complete() const
00023 {
00024 #ifdef  CPPL_VERBOSE
00025   std::cerr << "# [MARK] _dsymatrix::complete() const"
00026             << std::endl;
00027 #endif//CPPL_VERBOSE
00028   
00029     for(long i=0; i<N; i++){
00030     for(long j=0; j<i; j++){
00031       Darray[i][j] =Darray[j][i];
00032     }
00033   }
00034 }
